m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      Directory:Principle Power, Inc. From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search WindFloat Provides Renewable Spinnoff Application from Oil Platform Tech Renewable energy company, Principle Energy Inc., is presently focused on two areas: a floating platform for offshore wind, wave, and current harnessing; and an inflatable concentrated solar technology developed by Cool Earth Solar. WindFloat, conceived by Marine Innovation & Technology and exclusivly licensed by Principle Power, is a float
